name: The Roambot
description:
The Roambot roams the land, which is full of crabs.

Download the game to get the best experience.

Keyboard:

  • Movement: A/D or left/right,
  • Jump: space
  • Fullscreen: F11
  • Pause: Esc

Controller:

  • Movement: Analog stick or D-pad
  • Jump: bottom action button
  • Pause: Start

Assets used:

  • https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/120
  • https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack 
  • https://ansimuz.itch.io/gothicvania-rocky-pass-environment
